verses.text: \w Say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w your|strong="H0834"\w* brothers, Ammi; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w your|strong="H0834"\w* sisters, Ruhamah.

\w Take|strong="H7760"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* cause \w against|strong="H4480"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* mother, \w take|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* wife, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w* husband; \w let|strong="H7760"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w away|strong="H4480"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w* loose ways \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w* face, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w* false ways \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w between|strong="H4480"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w* breasts;

\w For|strong="H7355"\w* fear \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w may|strong="H0251"\w* take away \w her|strong="H0559"\w* robe \w from|strong="H0251"\w* \w her|strong="H0559"\w*, making \w her|strong="H0559"\w* uncovered as \w in|strong="H0251"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* day \w of|strong="H0251"\w* \w her|strong="H0559"\w* birth; making \w her|strong="H0559"\w* like \w a|strong="H0251"\w* waste place \w and|strong="H0251"\w* \w a|strong="H0251"\w* dry land, causing \w her|strong="H0559"\w* death through need \w of|strong="H0251"\w* water.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w* children, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* children \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w* loose ways.

\w For|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H7760"\w* mother \w has|strong="H0776"\w* \w been|strong="H0776"\w* untrue; she \w who|strong="H3205"\w* \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w them|strong="H7896"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w has|strong="H0776"\w* done things \w of|strong="H0776"\w* shame, \w for|strong="H0776"\w* she said, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* go \w after|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* lovers, \w who|strong="H3205"\w* \w give|strong="H3205"\w* \w me|strong="H7760"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* bread \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* water, \w my|strong="H7760"\w* wool \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* linen, \w my|strong="H7760"\w* oil \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* wine.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* cause \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* put thorns \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w* road, building \w up|strong="H0853"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* wall round \w her|strong="H3588"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* go \w on|strong="H7355"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w* way.

\w And|strong="H3899"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* goes \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* overtake \w them|strong="H5414"\w*; \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w makes|strong="H5414"\w* search \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* see \w them|strong="H5414"\w*; \w then|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* go \w back|strong="H0310"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* first husband, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w then|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H4325"\w* better \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w than|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3651"\w* \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H0853"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* knowledge \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w it|strong="H3651"\w* \w was|strong="H1870"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w who|strong="H4672"\w* gave \w her|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* grain \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* wine \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* oil, increasing \w her|strong="H3651"\w* silver \w and|strong="H1870"\w* gold which \w they|strong="H3651"\w* gave \w to|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Baal.

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w take|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* grain \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* \w time|strong="H6258"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* wine, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w take|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* wool \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* linen \w with|strong="H0413"\w* which \w her|strong="H0413"\w* body might \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w been|strong="H6258"\w* covered.

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* \w now|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* shame clear \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* eyes \w of|strong="H3045"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* lovers, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w take|strong="H3045"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H3045"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* \w put|strong="H7725"\w* \w an|strong="H3947"\w* end \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H5337"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* joy, \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w feasts|strong="H4150"\w*, \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w new|strong="H8492"\w* moons, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* Sabbaths, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H5337"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* regular meetings.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w make|strong="H1540"\w* waste \w her|strong="H1540"\w* vines \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* fig-trees, \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w which|strong="H5869"\w* \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H0376"\w* said, These \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* payments \w which|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w made|strong="H1540"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*; \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w make|strong="H1540"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* waste \w of|strong="H0376"\w* trees, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* field \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w take|strong="H5337"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* food.

\w And|strong="H4150"\w* I \w will|strong="H7673"\w* give \w her|strong="H3605"\w* punishment \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* days \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Baals, \w to|strong="H4150"\w* whom \w she|strong="H2320"\w* \w has|strong="H3605"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* burning perfumes, when \w she|strong="H2320"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w* herself fair \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* nose-rings \w and|strong="H4150"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* jewels, \w and|strong="H4150"\w* went after \w her|strong="H3605"\w* lovers, giving \w no|strong="H3605"\w* thought \w to|strong="H4150"\w* \w me|strong="H3605"\w*, says \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord.

\w For|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H0834"\w* \w cause|strong="H5414"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* come \w into|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w waste|strong="H8074"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* words \w of|strong="H7704"\w* comfort \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* give \w her|strong="H5921"\w* vine-gardens \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w there|strong="H1992"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* valley \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Achor \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* door \w of|strong="H3068"\w* hope; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* give \w her|strong="H5921"\w* answer \w there|strong="H1992"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w young|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* came \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Egypt.

\w And|strong="H3820"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* day, \w says|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord, \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, Ishi; \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* never \w again|strong="H1696"\w* \w give|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* name \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Baali;

\w For|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w take|strong="H5927"\w* \w away|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* names \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Baals \w out|strong="H8033"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* mouth, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* never again \w will|strong="H0776"\w* she say \w their|strong="H5414"\w* names.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H7121"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* agreement \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* field \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* birds \w of|strong="H0376"\w* heaven \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w things|strong="H1961"\w* \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w go|strong="H1961"\w* low \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* earth; \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* put \w an|strong="H1961"\w* end \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* bow \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* sword \w and|strong="H3068"\w* war \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* land, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w take|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w rest|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* peace.

\w And|strong="H6310"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H5493"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H5750"\w* \w my|strong="H5493"\w* bride \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w ever|strong="H5750"\w*; truly, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H5493"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H5750"\w* \w my|strong="H5493"\w* bride \w in|strong="H5750"\w* righteousness \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w in|strong="H5750"\w* right judging, \w in|strong="H5750"\w* love \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w in|strong="H5750"\w* mercies.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w take|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* bride \w in|strong="H0776"\w* good faith, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* knowledge \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* Lord.

\w And|strong="H4941"\w* \w it|strong="H4941"\w* \w will|strong="H6664"\w* \w be|strong="H5769"\w*, \w in|strong="H4941"\w* that day, says \w the|strong="H4941"\w* \w Lord|strong="H2617"\w*, that I \w will|strong="H6664"\w* give an answer \w to|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H4941"\w* heavens, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H4941"\w* heavens \w to|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H4941"\w* earth;

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* earth \w will|strong="H3068"\w* give \w its|strong="H0853"\w* answer \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* grain \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* wine \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* oil, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* give \w an|strong="H3068"\w* answer \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Jezreel;

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* put \w her|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* seed \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w her|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* whom no \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* given; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* say \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w those|strong="H1992"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H0776"\w*, \w You|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* say, \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.
